attributes.action: UK schools should have a half day on Friday.
attributes.additional_details: I would like this to happen because it can give teachers more time to wind down and relax before the weekend and also students should be able to relax more over the weekend.
attributes.background: I would like you to possibly consider turning schools into the UK to have a half day on every Friday.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar action: 

"Mandate seven-hour days Monday to Thursday in schools for shorter Fridays" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741610

"Reduce the school week to four days a week" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727514
